channel.title: I need help with norweagian forums :)
channel.description:
i have made a forum and now i want rep :) i have added it but one person can only rep once a post like if one account post a message the other can only rep++ once on that topic :( and i know how to add how many rep you need and how many posts
and when i rep a green bar shows up and when i hold on it it only says reputation 100% 1 vote how could i make it so you can rep once per second minute to a user? like u can rep at the same topic but you have to wait 2 mins?

item.title: I need help with norweagian forums :)
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

well on PhpBB i actually got rep working
becuz on smf i only got it work
and there i could rep
with 0 posts and 0 rep
ok here is some questions on smf

how can i make u start with 10 rep?
how could i make so u cant rep b4
u have 20 rep?
how could i make u dont rep b4 20 posts?
how could i make u only rep 10 times a day?
how could i make me re pas many times i want?
how could i make only me rep myself?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2009, 09:10:12 am[/size][hr]answer theese and il change to smf
